comment: He's super easy to talk to but can be hard to get a hold of. His lectures are very interesting, often including stories from his personal experiences that make the class engaging. Provides great answers to questions. Weekly quizzes, exams every four, and a final. The PSA assignment is weighted the heaviest, so it's important to do well on that.

Great professor, strict on attendance. The textbook is provided by him for free, every week there is short quiz based on reading assignments, lecture, and textbook. Lecture are okay, I like that he doesn't read off the slide he knows what he's talking about. Sometimes he'll start discussions in class on random stuff which is cool.

He's a very chill professor and isn't too harsh of a grader. Quizzes were easy as long as you paid attention, and the essays we did have had a clear rubric. People said he was kind of harsh but I just think they didn't read the directions tbh.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Lecture heavy--Accessible outside class

comment: Took him for Fundamentals of Behavioral Healthcare. He requires a book - I read it, but you don't have to. Really interesting class. Especially if you're interested in mental illness. Take him!
Makes lectures interesting and gives examples from his own experiences. I think he cares most about you showing you're trying and putting in the work. He watches Hallmark Christmas movies ....A+
